reviews.content: I love this tweak! The perfect addition to my setup! ?

Awesome tweak! I highly recommend! Can’t wait until Manta is also updated :)
Does not work with Colorflow or Kalm
Nice tweak!! I would like to have the option to resize the icons.... Too big in my opinion
Very good tweak, worth the price, I recommend it.

to change the icons it send you to safe mode
version 2.2 works well when updating to 3.0 it sends me safe mode
v3.4 crashing springboard when icon touched
iOS 13.3 here. Can’t choose complications without unlocking screen. Respring when clicking on weather complication
Setting a background crashes my jailbreak and the automatic font color doesn’t work
Seriously best tweak ever! And the new “small” size in the update fits my setup perfectly, thank you!
3.4 Update crashes springboard. 3.3 is working great!
